pages.text: $(italic)The Pigment Pedestal is wonderful for automatically creating items. But if you need the same few items over and over again, you'll have to rearrange your whole construction.$(br2)Of course, you have found a more than adequate solution for that.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Fabrication Chest has four slots for crafting tablets. The recipes you have defined in these are always kept in stock - as long as the ingredients in the chest allow it.
